item.title: Kim Harvey Named Executive Producer of ‘CBS Evening News’
item.description: The veteran producer will lead the program, anchored by Maurice Dubois and John Dickerson.

item.title: Anxiety Builds at CBS News Over Potential Moves by Skydance
